page.title: 02Social comments
page.content: Most of this block is made up of farmland and open grazing.the over all effect is one of an attractive rural area with small villages and narrow roads.In fact there is a great deal of life in the area.The villages have some small industries in them.The area is constantly changing and as a result of good employment prospects the population is increasing. A large percentage of men in the area work in the big local complexes such as {Westlands Helicopters}in Yeovil { {Plesseys Electronics}in Templecombe or are stationed at{H.M.S.Heron}at Yeovilton.There is a danger that the villages may become dormitary towns for these places of employment.There has been a lot of concern about this recently.
